scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.ci-build: cd server && npm run ci-build && cd .. && npm run build-client
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.migrate: cd server && npm run migrate && cd ..
scripts.rollback: cd server && npm run rollback && cd ..
scripts.seed: cd server && npm run seed && cd ..
